trans-unit.source: Provides managed to unmanaged interoperation support for creating image objects.
trans-unit.target: 为创建图像对象提供托管到非托管的互操作支持。

trans-unit.source: This class provides creation mechanisms for the primary bitmap imaging class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供了主映像中的类的位图的创建机制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>。

trans-unit.source: This includes methods that create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> based on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)] objects , and memory sections.
trans-unit.target: 这包括方法可用于创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>基于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)]对象和内存部分。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the unmanaged bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 非托管位图的指针。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the bitmap's palette map.
trans-unit.target: 位图调色板映射的指针。

trans-unit.source: The size of the source image.
trans-unit.target: 源图像的大小。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration that specifies how to handle conversions.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何处理转换的枚举的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a managed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />, based on the provided pointer to an unmanaged bitmap and palette information.
trans-unit.target: 基于所提供的非托管位图和调色板信息的指针，返回一个托管的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: to return an object from this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从此方法返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the unmanaged icon source.
trans-unit.target: 非托管图标源的指针。

trans-unit.source: The size of the source image.
trans-unit.target: 源图像的大小。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration that specifies how to handle conversions.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何处理转换的枚举的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a managed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />, based on the provided pointer to an unmanaged icon image.
trans-unit.target: 基于所提供的非托管图标图像的指针，返回一个托管的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: to return an object from this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从此方法返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A pointer to a memory section.
trans-unit.target: 内存部分的指针。

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the width, in pixels, of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定位图宽度（以像素为单位）的整数。

trans-unit.source: An integer that specifies the height, in pixels, of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定位图高度（以像素为单位）的整数。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 枚举的一个值。

trans-unit.source: The stride of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 位图的跨距。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset into the memory stream where the image starts.
trans-unit.target: 图像从其开始的内存流字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Returns a managed <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />, based on the provided unmanaged memory location.
trans-unit.target: 基于所提供的非托管内存位置，返回托管的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />。

trans-unit.source: to return an object from this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从此方法返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
